name: UnderBox (DevRodas)
description:
This program is child-friendly and not trying to be bad

Explore underwater and create things with oldschool effect, there are sharks, fishes and more amazing viewed beauty!

The first creation I (devloper) ever uploaded for ITCH games...

All needed information, are in Opera file (underboxinfo), don't forget to support me!

Belive me, it's a sandbox game! Developer never writes lie-ing description of the game.

Have fun playing!

  -Little fishy

Sorry, for quality of screenshots of the game 😟
